amendment.description: An amendment numbered 80 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit funds made available under this Act from being used by the Department of Health and Human Services or any grantee to implement a mask mandate for children at Head Start programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kiley amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kiley amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kiley amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.
